content:
IContextBindingElement Interface

Definition

Defines the interface for a binding element that supports context exchange protocols.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("System.WorkflowServices, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
public interface IContextBindingElement

Remarks

This interface has no members.
